body: I am the architect of my life; I build its foundation and choose its contents.
I will become the best version of me.
I am walking in the truth of who I am
I am comfortable declaring my own worth.
I am amazing!
I am now filled with faith, certainty, and confidence. I now create and feel these emotions in my body
I have the power to live my dreams
I am unshakable in any storm.
I act with courage and confidence
I am a survivor and proud of my scars.
I am releasing old limiting beliefs about myself.
I am learning to step out of my comfort zone.
I am letting go more and more every day.
I am releasing all attachment to past hurts.
I am capable of thriving in any situation.
I am always served well by my inner wisdom.
I am free of resentment.
I am letting go of expectations and enjoying my journey.
I am releasing yesterday so that I can be fully present today.
I am welcoming the serenity of being free of emotional burdens.
I am at peace with my past.
I am a unique individual with unlimited potential.
I am worthy of overwhelming success.
I am meeting new people everyday that help me learn and grow.
I am inspired, motivated, and determined to succeed.
I am discovering all the ideas and solutions I need.
I am enjoying challenges that lead to even greater success.
I am creating a lifestyle that I love.
I am grateful for the gift of being alive today.
I am passionate about expressing gratitude to share my joy.
